title: Core Pfam
description: JSON schema for core Pfam collection in RCSB Data Warehouse.

rcsb_pfam_accession.description: The unique accession code of protein families and domains in the Pfam database.

rcsb_pfam_identifier.description: The unique identifier of protein families and domains in the Pfam database.

rcsb_pfam_seed_source.description: Pfam entries are classified into six different categories, depending on the length and nature of the sequence regions included in the entry: family, domain, repeats, motifs, coiled-coil, and disordered.

examples: Cell division control protein 24, OB domain 2
rcsb_pfam_description.description: A human-readable name of protein families and domains.

rcsb_pfam_clan_id.description: Details of the Pfam clan to which the entity belongs.

rcsb_pfam_provenance_code.description: Pfam-A is the manually curated portion of the Pfam database.
